openGraph.title: Medication Scheduler
openGraph.description: Enter a start time, interval, and dose count to generate a simple medication schedule automatically.

title: Medication Scheduler
description: Add a start time and interval to build a medication schedule instantly.
disclaimer: This is not medical advice. Always follow your prescription and guidance.
doseHint: You can enter between 1 and {{max}} doses.
empty: Fill in the inputs to see your schedule.

errors.startTime: Please enter the first dose time.
errors.interval: Interval must be at least 1 minute.
errors.doseCount: Dose count must be between 1 and {{max}}.
